TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignerActionService extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 建立管理组件的 对象集合的设计时服务。

span.span: Establishes a design-time service that manages the collection of objects for components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类负责管理在设计时窗体上存在的每个组件实例的 对象的集合。The class is responsible for managing the collection of objects for each instance of a component that exists on a form at design time. 此类启用项创建的直接推送模型，主要供设计时工具开发人员使用，不过它也可以由组件和自定义控件开发人员使用。This class enables a direct push model of item creation, and is primarily intended for use by design-time tool developers, although it can also be used by component and custom control developers. 设计时工具开发人员需要确定要为组件显示的项的列表，并确定此列表的更改时间。Design-time tool developers will need to determine the list of items to display for a component and determine when this list changes. 他们还可以创建与智能标记面板对象结合运行的外接程序。They may also create add-ins that operate in conjunction with smart tag panel objects. 高级组件开发人员可能需要动态控制与组件关联的项，从而替换或补充标准请求模型。Advanced component developers may need to dynamically control the items associated with a component, thus replacing or supplementing the standard pull model. 例如，可以根据其使用情况和组件的设计时状态更改 panel 命令。For example, panel commands can be altered depending on the context of their use and the design-time state of the component. > [!NOTE] > 实际上是推送和请求模型背后的驱动服务;但在后一种情况下，它将隐式运行。The is actually the driving service behind both the push and pull models; however, in the latter case it operates implicitly. 提供了一个简单的接口，用于访问和操作每个组件的项（包括以下方法和事件）： provides a straightforward interface for accessing and manipulating the items for each component, including the following methods and events: - 方法确定 当前是否正在管理特定组件。The method determines whether the is currently managing a particular component. - 方法支持项列表的枚举。The method supports the enumeration of the lists of items. - 方法允许向组件实例的一组现有项添加 或 。The method allows adding a or to the set of existing items for a component instance. 与此相反， 方法将删除一个或所有与组件关联的项列表。In contrast, the method removes one or all of the item lists associated with a component. > [!NOTE] > 方法表示将面板项与组件相关联的直接推送模式。The method represents the direct push model of associating panel items with a component. 与此相反，请求模型依赖于重写该组件的设计器类的 属性。In contrast, the pull model relies on overriding the property of the designer class for that component. 在设计图面上创建组件时，设计环境负责将这些项添加到当前 中。The design environment is responsible for adding these items into the current when a component is created on the design surface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 、、和 方法只考虑或影响推送模型项。The , , , and methods only consider or affect push-model items. - 事件指示项集合在组件中发生更改的时间。The event indicates when the collection of items changes for a component. 由于通常需要在组件的设计时快捷菜单及其面板中使用一些相同的面板项，因此 对象和设计器谓词之间存在很大的互操作性。Because it is often desirable to use some of the same panel items in both the component's design-time shortcut menu and its panel, a large degree of interoperability exists between objects and designer verbs. 如果组件设计器未显式指定 （也就是说，它不包含重写的 属性），则将从现有设计器谓词创建一个列表。If a component designer does not explicitly specify a (that is, it does not contain an overridden property), then a list will be created from existing designer verbs. 这些谓词由 属性指定。These verbs are specified by the property. 在这种情况下，内部谓词列表类用于包含谓词项面板项的集合。In this case, an internal verb list class is used to contain the collection of verb item panel entries. 如果希望将 用作面板条目和设计时快捷菜单项，则可以在项的构造函数中设置 `includeAsDesignerVerb` 参数。If you want a to be used both as a panel entry and a design-time shortcut menu entry, then you can set the `includeAsDesignerVerb` parameter in the item's constructor. 使用 来控制设计器的 的显示。Use the to control the display of your designer's .

related.span: Windows 窗体的设计器命令和 DesignerAction 对象模型

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 当前设计时环境的服务提供程序。

span.span: The service provider for the current design-time environment.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务提供程序是监视选择和组件更改所必需的。A service provider is necessary for monitoring selection and component changes. 它应支持 和 类型。It is expected to support the and types. 类使用内部表来管理组件及其关联 智能标记。The class uses an internal table to manage components and their associated smart tags. 通常，组件开发人员无需创建此类的实例;相反，它们可以通过调用 方法获取现有的实例。Typically, component developers will not need to create an instance of this class; instead, they can acquire an existing instance through a call to the method.

summary.span: 将一个或多个 对象添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds one or more objects to the current collection of managed smart tags.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp, class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList actionList) cil managed
Public Sub Add (comp As IComponent, actionList As DesignerActionList)

span.span: The to associate the smart tags with.

param.name: actionList
param.span: 包含要添加的新智能标记项的 。

span.span: The that contains the new smart tag items to be added.

summary.span: 将 添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds a to the current collection of managed smart tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示添加智能标记项的推送模式。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 备用拉取模型依赖于在设计器中重写相应组件的 属性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 调用此方法时，将扫描要添加的列表，查找 属性设置为 "`true`" 的任何 。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 通过调用 方法，将这些项添加到此组件的设计器谓词列表。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 智能标记在组件实例基础上进行管理。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 托管集合可能包含重复项。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 此方法引发 事件。This method raises the event.

exception.span: 两个参数之一或两个参数均为 。

span.span: One or both of the parameters are .

summary.span: 将 添加到当前的托管智能标记集合。

span.span: Adds a to the current collection of managed smart tags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法表示添加智能标记项的推送模式。The method represents the push model of adding smart tag items. 备用拉取模型依赖于在设计器中重写相应组件的 属性。The alternate pull model relies on overriding the property in the designer for the corresponding component. 调用此方法时，将扫描要添加的列表，查找 属性设置为 "`true`" 的任何 。When this method is called, the lists to be added are scanned for any with the property set to `true`. 通过调用 方法，将这些项添加到此组件的设计器谓词列表。These items are added to the list of designer verbs for this component, through a call to the method. 智能标记在组件实例基础上进行管理。Smart tags are managed on a component instance basis. 托管集合可能包含重复项。The managed collection may contain duplicate entries. 此方法引发 事件。This method raises the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 解除所有组件的管理，并清除所有推模型智能标记列表。

span.span: Releases all components from management and clears all push-model smart tag lists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将清空用于存储有关组件及其推送模型智能标记列表的信息的内部表。The method empties the internal table used to store information about components and their push-model smart tag lists. > [!CAUTION] > 由于此方法会影响当前服务所管理的所有组件，而不只是当前的组件，因此应谨慎使用此方法。Because this method affects all components managed by the current service, and not just the current component, this method should be used judiciously. 通常，设计时工具开发人员在重置设计图面时使用它。Typically, the design-time tool developer uses it when resetting a design surface. 组件开发人员应该改用 方法之一来删除单个智能标记项或列表。Component developers should use one of the methods instead to remove individual smart tag items or lists. 对于先前由当前服务托管的每个组件，都会引发 事件。A event is raised for each component that was previously managed by the current service.

related.span: Windows 窗体的设计器命令和 DesignerAction 对象模型

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent comp) cil managed
Public Function Contains (comp As IComponent) As Boolean

span.span: The to search for.

summary.span: 确定当前智能标记服务是否管理指定组件的操作列表。

span.span: Determines whether the current smart tag service manages the action lists for the specified component.

returns.span: 如果组件由当前服务管理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component is managed by the current service; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅识别推送模型智能标记，该标记与具有 方法的组件相关联。The method only recognizes push-model smart tags, which are associated to a component with the method. 尽管对由设计时工具创建的并发 实例的数量没有结构限制，但通常只为每个设计图面创建一项服务实例。Although there is no structural limitation on the number of concurrent instances created by a design-time tool, typically only a single instance of the service is created per design surface.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DesignerActionListsChanged As DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 为任何组件移除或添加 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a is removed or added for any component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了与 事件关联的专用类的集合。The following table shows the set of specialized classes associated with the event. |专用类型Specialized type|说明Description| |----------------------|-----------------| ||添加特定于智能标记列表管理的信息。Adds information specific to smart tag list management. 此类由 专用化。This class is specialized from .| ||将 与其处理程序连接。Connects the with its handler.| ||指示列表是否已添加或删除。Denotes whether a list has been added or removed.| 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 释放 类使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 接口所要求的唯一方法的实现。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它执行两个主要操作：It performs two main actions: - 通过调用 方法，从设计环境中的可用服务列表中删除当前服务。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 取消订阅关联的 接口中的组件更改事件。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

related.span: Windows 窗体的设计器命令和 DesignerAction 对象模型

span.span: Designer Commands and the DesignerAction Object Model for Windows Forms

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源，并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 接口所要求的唯一方法的实现。The method is the implementation of the only method mandated by the interface. 使用完 后调用此方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 它执行两个主要操作：It performs two main actions: - 通过调用 方法，从设计环境中的可用服务列表中删除当前服务。Removes the current service from the list of available services in the design environment through a call to the method. - 取消订阅关联的 接口中的组件更改事件。Unsubscribes to component change events from the associated interface. 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 返回与某个组件关联的智能标记项列表的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection GetComponentActions(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Function GetComponentActions (component As IComponent) As DesignerActionListCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: component
param.span: 与智能标记关联的组件。

span.span: The component that the smart tags are associated with.

summary.span: 返回与某个组件关联的智能标记项列表的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of smart tag item lists associated with a component.

returns.span: 指定组件的智能标记集合。

span.span: The collection of smart tags for the specified component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法等效于使用 的 `type` 参数调用 方法。The method is equivalent to a call to the method using a `type` parameter of . 因此，返回的集合将包含智能标记的推送列表和请求列表。Therefore, the collection returned will contain both the push and pull lists of smart tags. 返回的 是通过 方法添加的项列表的联合，还是从组件的站点获取的 实例中获取的列表。The returned is the union of item lists added through the methods and also the lists obtained from the instance obtained from the component's site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的重载 方法筛选 `type` 参数，该参数可具有以下值之一。This version of the overloaded method filters on the `type` parameter, which can have one of the following values. |值Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||所有关联的智能标记。All associated smart tags.| ||仅请求模型智能标记。Pull-model smart tags only.| ||仅推送模型智能标记。Push-model smart tags only.| 如果某个组件的关联设计器未提供请求模型智能标记列表，则 方法将改为使用该设计器的 "设计时" 快捷菜单中的 "" 属性项。If the associated designer for a component does not supply a pull-model smart tag list, then the method will instead use the designer's design-time shortcut menu items from the property.

span.span: Retrieves the pull-model smart tags associated with a component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 方法的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method for the methods. 搜索 类型的请求模型智能标记，然后将它们添加到提供的 `actionLists` 集合。 searches for pull-model smart tags of type , and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection. 如果组件的开发人员未通过其设计器的 属性显式提供智能标记的集合，则此方法将重用设计时快捷菜单项，这些项是通过设计器的 属性获取的。If the component's developer does not explicitly supply a collection of smart tags through the property of its designer, this method will reuse the design-time shortcut menu entries, which are obtained through the property of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 方法的帮助器方法。The method is a helper method for the methods. 它会搜索 类型的推送模型智能标记，然后将它们添加到提供的 `actionLists` 集合。It searches for push-model smart tags of type , and then adds these to the supplied `actionLists` collection.

summary.span: 从一个或多个组件断开与一个或多个智能标记列表的关联。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList actionList) cil managed

param.span: 要移除的智能标记列表。

summary.span: 从由当前服务管理的所有组件中移除指定的智能标记列表。

span.span: Removes the specified smart tag list from all components managed by the current service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的 方法通常由设计工具开发人员使用，因为组件开发人员通常不知道当前设计空间中存在哪些其他组件。This version of the method is typically used by design tool developers, because component developers typically do not know what other components exist in the current design space. 如果成功，则此方法将引发 事件。If successful, this method raises the event.
